what: Homework6: Sparse numeric vector class and utilities — Homework6-package
title: Homework6: Sparse numeric vector class and utilities — Homework6-package
text: package provides S4 class sparse_numeric representing sparse numeric vectors, along basic arithmetic, plotting, utility functions addition, subtraction, multiplication, inner product, norms, standardization.

title: Homework6: Sparse numeric vector class and utilities — Homework6-package

text: Computes mean sparse_numeric vector, counting implicit zeros.

text: Adds two sparse_numeric vectors length returns sum, represented sparse_numeric.

what: Inner product of two sparse_numeric vectors — sparse_crossprod
title: Inner product of two sparse_numeric vectors — sparse_crossprod
text: Computes standard Euclidean inner product two sparse_numeric vectors length.

what: Elementwise multiply two sparse_numeric vectors — sparse_mult
title: Elementwise multiply two sparse_numeric vectors — sparse_mult
text: Computes elementwise (Hadamard) product x * y two sparse_numeric vectors length.

Class
text: S4 class representing sparse numeric vectors storing non-zero values positions.

title: Class
text: value Numeric vector non-zero values. pos Integer vector 1-based positions non-zero values. length Single integer giving full length underlying vector.

title: Methods for sparse_numeric objects — sparse_numeric-methods
text: S4 methods defined sparse_numeric class, including arithmetic operators, norms, utility functions.

title: Methods for sparse_numeric objects — sparse_numeric-methods
code: # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric' show(object)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_add(x, y)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_sub(x, y)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_mult(x, y)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' sparse_crossprod(x, y)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' e1 + e2  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' e1 - e2  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' e1 * e2  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric' norm(x, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric' standardize(x, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric,sparse_numeric' plot(x, y, ...)  # S4 method for class 'sparse_numeric' length(x)

title: Methods for sparse_numeric objects — sparse_numeric-methods
text: object sparse_numeric object. x, y, e1, e2 sparse_numeric objects used operands arithmetic utility methods. ... Additional arguments passed methods (currently ignored).

title: Methods for sparse_numeric objects — sparse_numeric-methods
text: help topic exists primarily satisfy R CMD check methods documented. See documentation sparse_numeric class corresponding generics details behavior.

title: Subtract two sparse_numeric vectors — sparse_sub
text: Computes x - y two sparse_numeric vectors length.

title: Standardize a sparse_numeric vector — standardize
text: Centers scales sparse_numeric vector subtracting mean (entries, including zeros) dividing sample standard deviation. standard deviation zero finite, vector zeros returned.
